name: 7 (itch) (Ho Dan Ze)
description:
Overview

Collect resources, craft from between 7 spells to protect yourself with and survive waves of enemy until day 7 to face off against the boss.

Controls

Move around using WASD

1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8 to Select Spell/Potion

LMB to Fire Spells/Use Potion

Mechanics

Travel around the randomly generated map to collect resources. 

Bring these resources to a cauldron to craft spells before the safe timer is over. 

Use the crafted spells to fight off enemies and survive

MAGES Institute of Excellence

Project 7 was developed over the span of 6 weeks as part of my "Programming 2: Intermediate Game Programming" Module
